column5: You will get a first overview about the main functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: Basic idea of a ticket systems: a interface for the customer to the company
column7:
You as the Customer
- check the customer's mailbox for account confirmation
- visit the company's sign in page on firma.de/login.html>
- sign in with your new account
- send different requests within the customer interface

You as the Agent
- find the corresponding tickets
- close the ticket. Pretend the customer now had questions again to one of those closed tickets, so he did a phone call to the companys help desk, you will now open a 'New Phone Ticket' regarding to that query
